pages.text: An abundance of flowers of every type will grow in the area around the pyre, useful for creating such resources as $(l:resources/petals)petals$() or dyes, or even decoration.$(br2)$(info) $(l:spells/natures_scythe)Nature's Scythe$() makes clearing out tall grass before the ritual easy.$(br2)Flowers grown by this ritual can be configured with CraftTweaker.
As a $(l:rituals/tiers)$(bold)tier 0$() ritual, there are no additional requirements to complete this ritual.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Duration:$() The ritual lasts for $(ritual:flower_growth/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Size:$() Ritual area extends $(ritual:flower_growth/radius_x) and $(ritual:flower_growth/radius_z) blocks from the center, and vertically by $(ritual:flower_growth/radius_y) blocks.$(br2)$(bold)Frequency:$() Flowers are grown every $(ritual:flower_growth/SECONDS/interval) seconds when an eligible location can be found.
